name: Early Years Parental Consent
description: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system to represent whether parental consent to share information with health professionals and other practitioners has been obtained.
copyright: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright Â© 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.

concept.display: Consent given by person with parental responsibility (finding)
Consent declined by person with parental responsibility (finding)
